sections.title: Gray Warden (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Gray Warden class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Gray Wardens gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Anonymity ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Grants a morale bonus equal to class level on Bluff and Disguise checks made to conceal identity.

sections.title: Sneak Attack ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, starting at +1d6 damage and increasing by +1d6 every four levels (5th, 9th).

sections.title: Harsh Judgment (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Functions like inquisitor judgment but limited to destruction, piercing, purity, and smiting judgments.

sections.title: Stern Gaze ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Grants a morale bonus equal to 1/2 class level on Intimidate and Sense Motive checks.

sections.title: Bane (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Enhances weapon to excel against certain foes, identical to inquisitor's bane ability, usable for rounds per day equal to class level.

sections.title: Dramatic Interrogation ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Grants +5 competence bonus on Diplomacy, Intimidate, and Perform checks when threatening a helpless creature to influence others.

sections.title: Execution Feats ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Grants bonus feats from a specific list every two levels starting at 4th, ignoring prerequisites.

sections.title: Grim Investigator ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Allows using Intimidate instead of Diplomacy to gather information and grants a reroll on Sense Motive checks opposing Bluff.

sections.title: Second Judgment (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Allows selecting two different judgments when using judgment ability, consuming only one use, with swift action switching.

sections.title: Improved Bane (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Increases bane ability damage to 3d6 against creatures of the selected type.

sections.title: Sinister Bane (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Adds the menacing weapon special ability to melee weapons when using bane ability.

sections.title: Slaying Judgment (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Allows declaring a slaying judgment on attack that forces a Fortitude save or die, like a slaying arrow effect.

sections.title: Greater Bane (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Increases bane ability damage to 4d6 against creatures of the selected type.

sections.title: Final Demise (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Once per week, can capture the soul of a killed creature in weapon like soul bind spell, transferable to final blade.

sections.title: True Death (Su) (Gray Warden)
sections.description: Creatures slain by Gray Warden require DC 25 caster level check for resurrection magic to succeed.
